page.title: 09LYNSEY'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 8.00 and get washed and dressed,then I have breakfast.For my breakfast I have wheatflakes,toast and a cup of coffee.By this time my brother John and sister Sharon have already gone to secondary school.When I have finished my breakfast I start to get ready for school I collect my gym kit and put my shoes and coat on.I walk to school at a quarter to nine.When I get to school I play for a while before the bell rings.We usually do maths, reading and language work in the morning. At 10.30 we have milk followed by our morning break.Lunches are supplied from central kitchen although some children prefer to bring packed lunches. In the afternoon we have gym. School closes at 3.15 then I go home for tea.After tea I usually watch T.V. or read until bedtime at 9p.m.
